pkgmetadata.longdescription: Computes Pdf, Cdf, Quantile, Random Numbers and Provides Estimation for any Univariate Wrapped Distributions // Computes the pdf, cdf, quantile, random numbers for any wrapped G distributions. Computes maximum likelihood estimates of the parameters, standard errors, 95 percent confidence intervals, value of Cramer-von Misses statistic, value of Anderson Darling statistic, value of Kolmogorov Smirnov test statistic and its $p$-value, value of Akaike Information Criterion, value of Consistent Akaike Information Criterion, value of Bayesian Information Criterion, value of Hannan-Quinn information criterion, minimum value of the negative log-likelihood function and convergence status when the wrapped distribution is fitted to some data.
